page.title: 01HILTON VILLAGE
page.content:
{
Our block includes our school and the village of Hilton.Most of the children in our school come from Balintore which also has most of the shops.There is only one shop in Hilton.Most of our block is farmland.It is very good fertile land growing peas,potatoes, oil seed rape,oats,wheat,barley and spring barley.A crop introduced within the past two years is oil seed rape and this year sees the introduction of deer being reared on Balintore Farm. Basic industries are Farming,working at the Highland Fabrication yard at Nigg,steel fabrication at Balmuchy and fishing.The later two industries show the area has changed.Salmon fishing until a few years ago was the main industry in Hilton. The season started in mid February and lasted till Sept.
